content.body: i had to revert 3006; the biblio task failed on it because it was trying to publish a sha that had already been published previously. that should probably be a silent success condition?
uhhh the task uses the commit number, not the sha
and the only way for the commit number to be reused is if you force-push to main, I think? reverts count as commits for the purposes of `rev-list --count`
content.formatted_body: and the only way for the commit number to be reused is if you force-push to main, I think? reverts count as commits for the purposes of rev-list --count

content.body: if you didn't force-push, I don't know what's going on there
